title: Where has Flex q gone?
body: Sorry just wanted to know why you disabled the q because i couldn't find any information on it. Thanks.

replies.body:
Flex que is turned off everyday between 7 - 10am (EDT).
Solo/Duo is turned off everyday between 4 - 7am (EDT).

Don't ask me why, Riot just decided to do it.
It's because the population of the queues was too low at those times which was leading to bad matchmaking.
